entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers or thunderstorms beginning early this evening. Risk of a severe thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature steady near 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 17. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
